mapper.select: select count(*) from commute where CHECK_DATE = date(now()) and user_idennum = #{userIdennum} and status IN ("WORKON", "WORKOFF");
select count(*) from commute where CHECK_DATE = date(now()) and user_idennum = #{userIdennum} and status = #{status};
mapper.insert: insert into commute values(#{userIdennum}, date(now()), now(), null, #{status});
mapper.select: SELECT users.user_idennum AS userIdennum, users.user_name AS userName, commute.check_date AS checkDate, commute.check_in_time AS checkInTime, commute.check_out_time AS checkOutTime, commute.status AS status FROM commute INNER JOIN users ON users.user_idennum = commute.user_idennum WHERE users.user_idennum = #{userIdennum} ORDER BY commute.check_date DESC;
